title: Tallmadge teacher uses honor as a platform
teaser: A high school instructor from Tallmadge has won the Ohio Teacher of the Year Award.English teacher Lori Michalec was announced as the winner at an assembly at the school Monday.Michalec says as Teacher of the Year, she has the opportunity to advocate for public education in Ohio. Currently, she is preparing testimony against House Bill 597 in support of the Common Core. She sees the Common Core as an improvement over No Child Left Behind standards. WKSU's Lyndsey Schley reports.
